definition: to scrape/to blow/to shave/to plunder/to extort
"knife" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 18)/see also 立刀旁[li4 dao1 pang2]/see also 側刀旁|侧刀旁[ce4 dao1 pang2]
to have a whole new level of respect for sb or sth/to sit up and take notice (of sb's improved performance etc)
to rake in (money)/to plunder/to milk people dry
to search one's guts and belly (idiom); to racks one's brains for a solution
(coll.) a slap on one's face/a cuff
variant of 頂呱呱|顶呱呱[ding3 gua1 gua1]
variant of 頂呱呱|顶呱呱[ding3 gua1 gua1]
variant of 呱呱叫[gua1 gua1 jiao4]

sentences.english: I could literally count the patches on the ripstop nylon.
sentences.chinese: 我甚至能够精确地数清防刮尼龙伞上的补丁。

sentences.english: I find the best way to do this is to scrape them with an X-acto knife.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得最好的方法这样做是为了刮他们的X雅刀。

sentences.english: A windy march and a rainy April makes a beautiful May.
sentences.chinese: 三月刮和风，雨下四月里，五月风光多美丽。

sentences.english: He scraped the paintwork of his car.
This is a special flat stone that is wiped smoothly along the skin.
sentences.chinese: 刮痧是用一块特殊的平薄的石头来刮拭皮肤。

sentences.english: As I tend to shave my chin last, I asked him why.
sentences.chinese: 但我却倾向于最后刮下巴，所以我问他这是为什么。

sentences.english: The main symptom is creamy white legions in the mouth that can be scraped away.
sentences.chinese: 其主要症状是在口腔中产生大量可刮除的乳白色物体。

sentences.english: I grew a heard during the trip, but I shaved it off when I came home.
sentences.chinese: 我旅行时留了胡子，但我回到家时就把它刮了。

sentences.english: These spots are usually caused by bumps and scrapes to the base of your nails.
sentences.chinese: 这些白点通常是由于指甲根部受到碰撞和刮擦引起的。

sentences.english: According to the market demand and development of production of special boneless wiper.
sentences.chinese: 并且根据市场需求研发生产多种车型的专用无骨雨刮。

sentences.english: If your face is clean shaven, shave regularly.
sentences.chinese: 如果你的脸是刮得比较干净的，那么要定期刮。

sentences.english: The wind blew my cap off.
The wind is blowing hard; please see to that all the windows are fastened properly.
sentences.chinese: 刮大风了，请务必把所有的窗子都关好。

sentences.english: Using Improved serape-making method, the studies were made on the stomatal density of flag leaves of rice.
sentences.chinese: 用改良刮制法研究了水稻剑叶的气孔密度。

sentences.english: Listen to the(wind). Today is a (windy) day.
sentences.chinese: 听风在刮，今天是个有风的日子。

sentences.english: There will be fogging, a wet windshield, raindrops and wipers.
sentences.chinese: 会有雾，湿的挡风玻璃，雨滴和雨刮。

definition: to scrape off/to shave off (whiskers etc)/(of the wind) to blow sth away
to blow/to play a wind instrument/to blast/to puff/to boast/to brag/to end in failure/to fall through
to pat/to slap/(of a bird) to flap (one's wings)
to roll up/to curl up/(of dust etc) to swirl up
variant of 捲起|卷起[juan3 qi3]
to wipe/to erase/rubbing (brush stroke in painting)/to clean/to polish
to smear/to wipe/to erase/classifier for wisps of cloud, light-beams etc
(onom.) sound of the wind or the breathing of sb who is sound asleep
to seize/to clutch/to grab firmly and pull
